allOf.description: Extensions to the Snssai data type, sdRanges and wildcardSd shall not be present simultaneously

sdRanges.description: When present, it shall contain the range(s) of Slice Differentiator values supported for the Slice/Service Type value indicated in the sst attribute of the Snssai data type

wildcardSd.description: When present, it shall be set to true, to indicate that all SD values are supported for the Slice/Service Type value indicated in the sst attribute of the Snssai data type
